programme.desc: When a father finds his teen daughter brutally murdered, a family fights for justice. With no clear motive and no witnesses, the killer remains at large. Until police uncover a cold-blooded betrayal, exposing a dark underworld inside this quiet town.

programme.desc: A recent Tennessee high school grad finds herself in the grasp of an aggressive and drug-crazed local thug. Meanwhile, a lonely Alabama divorcee falls for a Latin lover who proves to be a sadistic villain with murder on his mind.

programme.desc: In 2000, 31-year-old Mike Williams vanished while duck hunting on a Florida lake. His boat and his shotgun were found, but not his body. Seventeen years later, a violent kidnapping led detectives to suspects who had been there all along.

programme.title: Murder Among Friends
programme.desc: In Johnstown, NY, a young man's disrespectful behavior has his friends seeing red. The group plots to teach him a lesson, but things get horrifically out of hand- kicking off a murder mystery more intricate than any jigsaw puzzle.

programme.title: Killer Bods
programme.desc: Competition among personal trainers at a high-end Florida gym is intense. A new general manager comes aboard to steady the ship, but tension lies just beneath the surface. A volatile mix of pride and rage ignites a horrific and deadly chain reaction.

programme.title: Deadly Women
programme.desc: A woman disapproves of her granddaughter's new boyfriend and plots to eliminate him.

programme.title: Web of Lies
programme.desc: Angela Allen joins a social networking site where she soon falls in love. After weeks of texting, they decide to meet in person. Their first meeting seems to trouble Angela, but when she goes out for a second time, she never comes home.

programme.title: 'Til Death Do Us Part
programme.desc: To most people, teenage sweethearts Steven and Michelle Gibson seem to be happily married. They have four children and live a fun and adventurous life together. But the couple is harboring a dark secret, one that will tear the family apart.

programme.title: Forbidden: Dying for Love
programme.desc: When lonely teen Meagan Grunwald meets handsome 26-year-old felon Angel Garcia, it's love at first sight. But their whirlwind romance spirals into a hurricane of passion that leaves innocence destroyed and a trail of death and devastation in its path.

programme.title: Twisted Sisters
programme.desc: A cold-blooded murder in a devout prayer group triggers a bizarre investigation in Oregon. As police uncover the unlikely culprits pulling the strings, chilling beliefs are brought to light.

programme.title: The Wonderland Murders
programme.desc: A cold case from Northern California heats up when Detective Molly Daul ties a brutal assault case she's working on to this twelve year old murder. And when this killer strikes in Portland, multiple homicide detectives team up to take him down.

programme.title: Your Worst Nightmare
programme.desc: With a serial killer on the loose in Arlington, TX, 22-year-old Adriane Fields can't shake the chilling suspicion that she's next on the list. Crippled by fear, she moves across town, only to come face-to-face with what she feared most.

programme.title: Diabolical
programme.desc: Donna Scrivo adult son Ramsay in days, and she's worried. She alerts the local police, but days pass with no sign of him anywhere. Then a grisly discovery of a severed human head and body parts along a rural highway reveals a act of shocking violence.

programme.title: Fear Thy Neighbor
programme.desc: A handyman, living rent-free in the home of a generous friend, grows increasingly paranoid about his neighbors; filming them constantly and fighting with them incessantly until conflict escalates out of control and culminates in explosive violence.

programme.desc: Two college girls rent an apartment off campus together, but they couldn't be more different. Little arguments escalate into an all-out war, and the presence of a boyfriend sends the feud over into a spiral of mutual hate ending in a deadly fight.
